name: Thoma
title: "Protector From Afar" Thoma
desc: A protector from abroad, loyal to the end.

attributes.source: Reward for inviting Thoma to a duel at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with him

skills.name: Blazing Blessing
skills.desc: Deals 2 <span style="color:#FF9999FF">Pyro DMG, creates 1 <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Blazing Barrier.

skills.name: Crimson Ooyoroi
skills.desc: Deals 2 <span style="color:#FF9999FF">Pyro DMG, creates 1 <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Blazing Barrier and <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Scorching Ooyoroi.
